languages.text: {n}Сквозь одежду Войгтвира пробивается ослепительное сияние глифов, вырезанных на его теле жестоким наставником.{/n} "Не...на...вижу!" {n}Чудовищным усилием Кунрад пропихивает последнее, исполненное ярости слово сквозь заливающуюся кровью трахею.{/n}

{n}The glyphs carved into Voigtvir's body by his cruel mentor are shining blindingly through his clothes.{/n} "I... hate... you!" {n}With a terrible effort, he squeezes his furious last words out of his blood-filled windpipe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сквозь одежду Войгтвира пробивается ослепительное сияние глифов, вырезанных на его теле жестоким наставником.{/n} "Не...на...вижу!" {n}Чудовищным усилием Кунрад пропихивает последнее, исполненное ярости слово сквозь заливающуюся кровью трахею.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The sharp blade pierces Kunrad's coat and his chest. It sinks deep into his flesh, seeking his heart. The glyphs carved into Voigtvir's body by his cruel mentor are shining blindingly through his clothes.{/n} "I — hate — you!" {n}With a terrible effort, Kunrad squeezes his furious last words out of his blade-ripped windpipe.{/n}

{n}The sharp blade pierces Kunrad's coat and his chest. It sinks deep into his flesh, seeking his heart. The glyphs carved into Voigtvir's body by his cruel mentor are shining blindingly through his clothes.{/n} "I — hate — you!" {n}With a terrible effort, Kunrad squeezes his furious last words out of his blade-ripped windpipe.{/n}

{n}The glyphs carved into Voigtvir's body by his cruel mentor are shining blindingly through his clothes.{/n} "I... hate... you!" {n}With a terrible effort, he squeezes his furious last words out of his blood-filled windpipe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}他残忍的导师刻在他身上的文字，此刻闪闪发光。{/n}“我……恨死……你了……！”{n}昆拉德费了很大劲，才勉强从灌满了血的气管中挤出了最后这几个字。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The glyphs carved into Voigtvir's body by his cruel mentor are shining blindingly through his clothes.{/n} "I... hate... you!" {n}With a terrible effort, he squeezes his furious last words out of his blood-filled windpipe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}锋利的刀刃刺穿了穿了昆拉德的外套和胸膛，刀刃深深地刺入了他的肉体，寻找着他的心脏。他残忍的导师刻在他身上的文字，此刻正在闪闪发光。{/n}“我……恨死……你了……！”{n}昆拉德费了很大劲，才勉强从被利刃割断的气管中挤出了最后这几个字。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Glyphen, die von seinem grausamen Mentor in Voigtvirs Körper geritzt wurden, strahlen blendend hell durch seine Kleidung hindurch.{/n} "Ich ... hasse ... Euch!" {n}Mit unglaublicher Mühe presst er seine zornigen letzten Worte aus seiner voller Blut stehenden Luftröhre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The glyphs carved into Voigtvir's body by his cruel mentor are shining blindingly through his clothes.{/n} "I... hate... you!" {n}With a terrible effort, he squeezes his furious last words out of his blood-filled windpipe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die scharfe Klinge durchbohrt Kunrads Mantel und seine Brust. Sie versinkt tief in seinem Fleisch, sucht sein Herz. Die Gylphen, die von seinem grausamen Mentor in Voigtvirs Körper geritzt wurden, strahlen blendend hell durch seine Kleidung hindurch.{/n} "Ich ... hasse ... Euch!" {n}Mit unglaublicher Mühe presst Kunrad seine zornigen letzten Worte aus seiner zerfetzten Luftröhre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los glifos grabados en el cuerpo de Voigtvir por su cruel mentor empiezan a brillar a través de sus ropajes.{/n} «¡Te... te... odio!». {n}Con un esfuerzo terrible, las últimas palabras del furibundo Kunrad brotan de su laringe llena de sangre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The glyphs carved into Voigtvir's body by his cruel mentor are shining blindingly through his clothes.{/n} "I... hate... you!" {n}With a terrible effort, he squeezes his furious last words out of his blood-filled windpipe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La afilada hoja perfora el abrigo de Kunrad y atraviesa su pecho. Se hunde en su carne, buscando su corazón. Los glifos grabados en el cuerpo de Voigtvir por su cruel mentor empiezan a brillar a través de sus ropajes.{/n} «¡Te... te... odio!». {n}Con un esfuerzo terrible, las últimas palabras del furibundo Kunrad brotan de su empalada laringe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les glyphes que son mentor cruel a gravés sur son corps brillent d'une lumière aveuglante à travers ses vêtements.{/n} {n}Au prix d'un effort surhumain, il parvient à cracher ses dernières paroles malgré le sang qui menace de l'étouffer :{/n} « Je... vous... hais ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The glyphs carved into Voigtvir's body by his cruel mentor are shining blindingly through his clothes.{/n} "I... hate... you!" {n}With a terrible effort, he squeezes his furious last words out of his blood-filled windpipe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La lame acérée transperce le manteau de Kunrad puis sa poitrine, s'enfonçant dans sa chair pour y trouver son cœur. Les glyphes que son mentor cruel a gravés sur son corps brillent d'une lumière aveuglante à travers ses vêtements. Au prix d'un effort surhumain, il parvient à cracher ses dernières paroles malgré sa trachée déchirée :{/n} « Je... vous... hais ! »

languages.text: {n}残酷な師によってボイトヴィルの身体に刻まれた象形文字が、彼の衣服を通してまばゆいばかりに輝いている。{/n}「私は…お前を…憎む！」{n}最後の力をふり絞り、クンラッドは刃で裂かれた気管から激しい最後の言葉を絞り出す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The glyphs carved into Voigtvir's body by his cruel mentor are shining blindingly through his clothes.{/n} "I... hate... you!" {n}With a terrible effort, he squeezes his furious last words out of his blood-filled windpipe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}残酷な師によってボイトヴィルの身体に刻まれた象形文字が、彼の衣服を通してまばゆいばかりに輝いている。{/n}「私は…お前を…憎む！」{n}最後の力をふり絞り、クンラッドは刃で裂かれた気管から激しい最後の言葉を絞り出す。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cani yönderinin Voigtvir'in bedenine kazıdığı glifler, kıyafetlerinin ardından göz alacak kadar parlıyor.{/n} "Senden... Nefret... Ediyorum!" {n}Kan dolu soluk borusundan bir hışımla son sözlerini sarf ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The glyphs carved into Voigtvir's body by his cruel mentor are shining blindingly through his clothes.{/n} "I... hate... you!" {n}With a terrible effort, he squeezes his furious last words out of his blood-filled windpipe.{/n}
